mapper.select: /* 스크랩 조회 */ SELECT scrap.*, IF(ISNULL(user.idx), 'false', 'true') as owner FROM memopad_scrap scrap LEFT JOIN memopad_user user ON scrap.writer = user.idx WHERE scrap.del_yn = 'N' ORDER BY scrap.reg_date DESC;
mapper.insert: /* 스크랩 등록 */ INSERT INTO memopad_scrap ( nation_code, city_idx, category_idx, image_url, title, description, writer, url, del_yn, reg_date ) VALUES ( #{nationCode}, #{cityIdx}, #{categoryIdx}, #{imageUrl}, #{title}, #{description}, #{writer}, #{url}, 'N', NOW() )
